summary.para: Contains I/O accounting information for a process or a job object. For a job object, the counters include all operations performed by all processes that have ever been associated with the job, in addition to all processes currently associated with the job.
The number of read operations performed.
The number of write operations performed.
The number of I/O operations performed, other than read and write operations.
The number of bytes transferred during operations other than read and write operations.
